entry.title: This Is Me Trying
entry.summary:
Author: wallyreads

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,170Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 233

Summary: It wasn’t a very good day.Though, Buck could say that about most days in his life. But this one was particularly rough.But, it did lead him to finding his home, so it was worth it all in the end.-After addict Evan Buckley saved a young Christopher Diaz from a shock tsunami at the Santa Monica Pier, Eddie Diaz promises to do everything he can to save Buck in return.And despite everything that has and will happen, Buck promises that this is him trying. [part 3 of taylor swift song series]

entry.title: Lighthouse
entry.summary:
Author: KilldevilandtheWildThings

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 90,774Chapters: 17/28Kudos: 650

Summary: Buck had lost-- he was sure of this now. His resolve only lasted a few weeks before his exterior began to crack; he was never a very good actor. He couldn’t keep up the greetings and the asking questions and the easy stroll. He let his shoulders creep up to his ears, let his foot tap incessantly. He did what his Captain told him, but stopped asking for anything more. Stopped following the conversation in the back of the engine on the way to the call; he just stared out the window, thinking about the case to come, preparing for it. When he woke every morning, there was no big recovery milestone to strive for, no big fight for the soul of his career to win. Not even the happy swell of being back on shift -- something so easy to dismiss, that had dominated so much of his life, that he had taken for granted-- that had catalyzed him each morning of his first week back.An old habit of his had returned. A bad habit.~~or: after the lawsuit, buck confronts what it was he wanted all along. he looks and looks and longs for it; the team look right through him. buck breaks-- right down the middle.

entry.title: Houses and Their Ghosts
entry.summary:
Author: OdetteSeashell

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,850Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 5

Summary: It is unbearable when your oh moment happens in the dead silence of your loft, your head between your legs, your heart twisting into something unrecognizable. When it dawns on you, breathless and horrified, that your best friend, your ride or die, your person is moving 800 miles away without even sparing you a second thought.It triggers abandonment issues, to say the least. Which led to Evan Buckley moving into his best friend’s house, sleeping in his best friend’s old bed, wandering through rooms filled with someone else’s memories.------------Or,In which Buck is bargaining the loss of his family and haunting a house that used to be a home. And in which Eddie Diaz, 800 miles away, he's starting to realize he might never choose anyone over Christopher, but his heart has some attachment left in the city of Angels.

entry.title: Once More (With Feeling)
entry.summary:
Author: Strawberrywaltz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,255Chapters: 19/25Kudos: 1,273

Summary: “I told him you could help.” Christopher says with such confidence that Eddie’s heart jumps into his throat. Because to Eddie, this isn’t a fight he can win. “Please help him.”“Christopher.” Eddie whispers and looks back down at the likely dying wild animal his son brought home.“Please?” Christopher’s eyes are wide and wet and looking at him with such hope.What can Eddie do? Say no? Of course not. “I’ll try, but Mijo, it looks pretty hurt.”“You can save him.” Christopher insists. “I know you can.”__Or: Christopher saves a fox on a field trip that ends up not being a fox after all.

entry.title: Wants and Needs
entry.summary:
Author: MagikMask

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 240,147Chapters: 24/24Kudos: 990

Summary: Spring had officially sprung in Los Angeles, and baby fever infects one of LA’s finest, one firefighter Eddie Diaz.He couldn’t stop thinking about having a kid with Buck if he tried, and maybe the universe doesn’t want him to based on the countless cute babies that keep winding up in his big arms.Not that he believes in that kinda thing.But he can’t tell Buck that, he could never ask him to leave work for nearly a year, so soon after he literally lost his mind. So he does the normal thing and keeps it in the same mental lock box he used to keep his feelings for Buck in. Meanwhile, somethings up with two out of three of Bobby’s kids and he needs to get to the bottom of it.(AKA the 6A rewrite where Buck is pregnant instead of doing that donor storyline, now fully complete + epilogue)

entry.title: Three's a Crowd
entry.summary:
Author: WillowFlycatcher

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,133Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 144

Summary: Hen can’t help but laugh a little on the way over. This thing Buck is doing — well, it’s sweet, she’ll give him that. It’s just very…Buck. It had surprised her at first, when he broke the news, but in the next instant it hadn’t surprised her at all. They’ve been at this for years, really. The loaded looks, the casual touches, the attached-at-the-hip of it all, the grand gestures, even — like this one.She’s fairly certain they don’t know they’re doing it. Scratch that, they absolutely don’t know they’re doing it. But that hasn’t stopped them so far, and she doesn’t suppose it will now.Or: When Bobby, Hen, and Chimney show up for the big reveal, no one answers the door. Only Hen figures out why.

entry.title: Day 56
entry.summary:
Author: meeki_Ba

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,814Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: Buck felt grateful and, without noticing, thought to himself, "Thank god this shift is quiet".He gasped and jumped in his seat. He’d just said the "Q word." Well, thought it, at least. Did that count? He figured it did. The gods were gods, after all— all-mighty, they could probably read minds.Eddie stared at him, puzzled, as Buck was visibly freaking out.“What’s going on with you?” Eddie asked.But before Buck could answer, the alarm went off. Buck understood that the gods did read his mind. Which could only mean one thing: this wasn’t going to be an easy call, nor an easy shift.

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,136Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 33

Summary: Post 8x09 when Buck subleases Eddie’s house after Eddie moves to Texas to reconcile with Chris. The process leaves Buck haunted by the thought of Eddie and his feelings toward him.Let’s pretend the kidnapping storyline didn’t happen :)Inspiration: Haunted by Taylor Swift (Plus a little lyric reference to All Too Well)This is only my second fic so pls go easy on me, but I welcome any feedback or comments! :)
